a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:49): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 - I agree about the tab issue (should count as one column); as far as UTF-8 in the message, I think there are likely many users in console envrionments who don't have UTF-8 support; as far as how to distinguish classes of messages, I think "Error; " and "Warning; " and "Note; " as a prefix in the message field
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:49): The other questions I don't have any brilliant insights one

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (13:54): "Its the very sweet ‚Äòalt‚Äô attribute which most of us do not use in our Image tags because we want to save our time or mainly because we think its useless. The ‚Äòalt‚Äô attribute is very important to place while writing the tag code for your image as it servers another keyword targeting purpose for image search bot."
